entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Bernières
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:59 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sainte-Foy - Laval University 2:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
